forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers. Cloudy. High near 30, with temperatures falling to around 26 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 24 mph, with gusts as high as 45 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 20. West northwest wind 16 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Blowing snow and a chance of snow showers before 4pm, then a chance of snow showers and patchy blowing snow. Cloudy. High near 21, with temperatures falling to around 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill values as low as -1. Northwest wind 20 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 50 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

sections.header: Bucks Run is closed due to poor conditions and wind damage.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Highly variable, but decent conditions this morning for skate and classic. If you're looking to get out and ski, do it this afternoon; the park has already decided to close for tomorrow. Given how thin the snow coverage is it's doubtful they'll be able to reopen until they spread more snow, and based on past practices, that's unlikely to happen until after New Year . But check anyways in case we get lucky.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 chairlifts, Rope Tow and Conveyor.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob terrain and chairlifts are currently closed on a temporary wind hold. We will reopen as soon as it is safe to do so. At this point we hope to resume operations for the night session, if not earlier. Please stay tuned for updates and we apologize for any inconvenience.
